name: Opulence Duochrome Lip Glo
about: What it is:A limited-edition lip gloss with an iridescent, multidimensional finish..Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Formulated with duochrome pigments, this lip gloss makes lips shine. Its iridescent, translucent finish sparkles as you move, creating a multidimensional effect. Enriched with hyaluronic acid, it leaves lips moisturized and comfortableâ€”without a sticky sensation.
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Leaves lips moisturized and comfortable without a sticky sensation...Polybutene, Octyldodecanol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Triacontanyl PVP, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Silica, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Trihydroxystearin, Tin Oxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Amorphophallus Konjac Root Powder, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Linalool. +/- CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides).
